name: server
description: ```bash npm init -y ``` ### Step 2 install package ``` npm install express nodemon cors morgan bcryptjs jsonwebtoken zod prisma ``` ### Step 3 npx prisma init to obtain file .gitignore, .env and folder prisma  ```bash npx prisma init ``` ### Step 4 push to github ```bash git init git add . git commmit -m "message" git remote add origin https://github.com/chatchai-suri/CC19-front-to-back-recap-api.git git branch -M main git push -u origin main ``` when update code ```bash git add . git commit -m "message" git push ```
